pageTitle: How would you like to tell us about your travel to or from work?
h1: How would you like to tell us about your travel to or from work?
hint: If you work at more than one location, tell us the distance in miles.
required: Select if you would like to provide total number of journeys or total distance in miles
radioJourneys: Total number of journeys taken to or from work each day
radioMileage: Total distance in miles travelled to or from work each day
